before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"2hhi5","text":"Prepare all working surfaces and equipment by spraying generously with RNase Zap!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

55655.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fqvo1","text":"RPMI with 5.6 mM glucose (cell culture media):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8iap3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86d47","text":"Remove 5 mL from a 500 mL bottle of RPMI, and add 5 mL penicillin/streptomycin. Close bottle and invert to mix.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40qgg","text":"Add 0.505 g glucose to RPMI, invert to mix, and incubate at room temperature for   to allow glucose to go into solution.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"baphi","text":"In a BSL-2 culture hood, vacuum filter 450 mL RPMI.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bdij","text":"Add 50 mL FBS.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7uva7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7m2u3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2gale","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"9297FDE056D511ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":34}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6lhv","text":"Once made, media can be stored at   for up to 1 month.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"75BA13E056D311ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10},"mutability":"","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"buu09","text":"DMEM (static incubation media):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9r5j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"feqsn","text":"Add the following ingredients into a 1 L Erlenmeyer flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qjsk","text":"8.28 g DMEM","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9qsk","text":"3.2 g sodium bicarbonate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7d7j5","text":"0.58 g L-gutamine","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9sje","text":"1.11 g HEPES","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jtv7","text":"0.11 g sodium pyruvate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76g35","text":"1 g bovine serum albumin","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ff4av","text":"70 mg ascorbate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e23l","text":"1 L deionized water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fms9g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eam2r","text":"Place a stir bar into the flask and situate on top of a magnetic stir plate. Stir at medium-high speed for   to allow all ingredients to go into solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"9E53882056D511ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7v3dj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79pcq","text":"Aliquot 500 mL of DMEM media into each of 2 plastic storage bottles to make 5.6 mM glucose and 16.7 mM glucose solutions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"59cap","text":"DMEM with 5.6 mM glucose:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh5ru","text":"Add 0.505 g glucose to 500 mL prepared DMEM media.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8br0h","text":"Incubate for   to allow glucose to go into solution.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1e7cd","text":"Vacuum-filter media.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"055A442056D411ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1vfpl","text":"DMEM with 16.7 mM glucose:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1flm","text":"Add 1.504 g glucose to 500 mL prepared DMEM media.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cocti","text":"Incubate for   to allow glucose to go into solution.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3vum0","text":"Vacuum-filter media.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"20615D3056D411ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8kml","text":"Acid ethanol (for hormone extraction):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lg61","text":"Pipet 5.5 mL 95% ethanol into a 15 mL conical tube.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jd7g","text":"Add 50µL hydrochloric acid.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65ipu","text":"Invert to mix.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9u270","text":"Pipet 5 mL RPMI with 5.6 mM glucose into each of two 6-cm cell culture dishes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eajrh","text":"Using an electronic pipette and an inverted microscope, pass islets into the first plate, and then into the second.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"de73k","text":"Place islets into a   cell culture incubator with 5% CO2 and leave overnight for a minimum of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":55,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":94,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"emov2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EA2D3FA056EB11ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":64800,"guid":"CA4908A0589811ECAD79917AB54C5834","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9vf1m","text":"Pipet 5 mL of DMEM with 5.6 mM glucose into a 6-cm cell culture dish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7js2n","text":"Label a 12-well plate for static incubation according to your experimental design. In the example below, two conditions are shown, low glucose (5.6 mM) and high glucose (16.7 mM). These conditions can be repeated in subsequent rows and/or plates for biological replicates as desired.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgri1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kkg5","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"A6D7CB20585411ECAD79917AB54C5834","height":355.9999999999999,"id":198464,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":58,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"fpa7m","text":"Figure 1: Example schematic of a 12-well incubation plate.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IPA-protocols_2_12well-plate copy.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4cbnyjx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4abnyjx.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4bbnyjx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb39bnyjx.webp","width":448.0549199084667}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cp5ud","text":"Pipet 2 mL of the appropriate media into each well. Note that each condition requires two wells, a \"wash\" well and an \"incubation\" well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":62,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1uaps","text":"Under microscope guidance, place around 20 islet equivalents (IEQs) into each wash well. This is typically a combination of 12 small, 5 medium, and 2 large islets. Use the chart below to measure islet sizes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mdvt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7grs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2g45o","text":"      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"83ss5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e9pkl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"8649C410589711ECAD79917AB54C5834","height":177.16363636363639,"id":198468,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":90,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"4mfed","text":"Figure 2: A reticle is used to IEQ islets and aliquot them into 12-well incubation plates.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IPA-protocols_2_IEQ-reticle.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4gbnyjx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4ebnyjx.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4fbnyjx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4dbnyjx.webp","width":580}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":16,"offset":65,"style":"bold"},{"length":156,"offset":246,"style":"italic"}],"key":"8c1nf","text":"The total volume of isolated islets is generally expressed as an islet equivalent or 'IEQ,' defined as an islet of 150-μm diameter. This helps to normalize downstream measurements, accounting for the fact that smaller islets contain fewer cells. As such, if islets are on the smaller side, 20 IEQ will consist of \u003e20 individual islets; if islets are larger, 20 IEQ may consist of \u003c20 individual islets.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4p4cs","text":"Once islet aliquots have been distributed to wash wells, place the 12-well plate onto the stereomicroscope stage, swirl the plate to move islets to center of each well, and transfer the islets into the subsequent incubation wells. Use no more than 20 µL media for the transfer to avoid dilution of culture media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49lek","text":"Cover the 12-well plate and place in   incubator with 5% CO2 for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":59,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3d0qi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhtl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"erjov","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F60B942056EB11ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":4200,"guid":"EDA1873056DD11ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6ro50","text":"The first 10 minutes of the incubation are designated as \"warm-up\" time, so this protocol is considered a 1-hour incubation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ag42f","text":"Remove plate from incubator and place on ice to cool down for  . During this time, label two 2-mL microcentrifuge tubes for each incubation well (islet aliquot): the first for islet extract and the second for media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"5E2C48A75E1911EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"am423","text":"Following the   incubation in step 17, spin down islet extract tubes for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":73,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"5BF55C505E1A11ECB7176F50E9513153","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"82A9894056DE11ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"3000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"852BC75056DE11ECA2CDE7C7E90CDC3A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6lc0i","text":"Perform hormone assay of your choice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4otsn","text":"Using an electronic pipette and an inverted microscope, transfer islets from overnight incubation plate (step 6) into the 6-cm plate with DMEM media. Islets will be picked from this plate and placed into the 12-well static incubation plate described in steps 9-10.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4k8uq","text":"Remove supernatant from islet pellets, and add 200 µL acid ethanol to each tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":54,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2t4rt","text":"Transfer islet extract tubes to   to begin incubation for  . Meanwhile, proceed to step 18.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F801DC585E1911EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":86400,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F801DD065E1911EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ci12h","text":"After islets are removed, transfer 1.5 mL media from each incubation well into the second of each pair of labeled microcentrifuge tubes. Store at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":146,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1C0DEF5A5E1911EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"t27e","text":"Return plate to the stereomicroscope stage, swirl the plate to move islets to center of each well, and pipet the islets in each incubation well into the first of each pair of labeled microcentrifuge tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8h36e","text":"Centrifuge the islet tubes for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"F27DD6E65E1911EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"200","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F27DD7E55E1911EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bdc0","text":"Transfer three 50-µL supernatant aliquots from each islet extract tube into prelabeled 2-mL screwcap tubes and store at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":120,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"75ro2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7D80AD7F5E1A11EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3cpro","text":"Centrifuge islets for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f2on8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"A413CE305C3B11ECBA5B39418CC36E90","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"200","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"731E15605C3B11ECBA5B39418CC36E90","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3bvks","text":"Remove supernatant and add 1 mL cold RNase-free PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":37,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d35h2","text":"Repeat steps 4-5 twice, for a total of 3 PBS washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"o3hi","text":"Remove supernatant, add 200 mL Lysis Solution, and vortex to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31mom","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6buql","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":40}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dd00g","text":"At this point, lysates can be stored at   for future RNA extraction. Islets can also be stored dry, but it is recommended by the kit protocol to freeze in Lysis Solution.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"brom0","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B1EEA2105C5311EC9ABE11CD47E5620E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10},"mutability":"","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fem80","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27aee","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"enjno","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BC4934305C3C11ECBA5B39418CC36E90","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"75","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","","","","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,100,100,100,100],"data":[["Sample IEQ","75 islets","100 islets","150 islets","200 islets","250+ islets"],["Elution steps","10 μL + 10 μL","15 μL + 10 μL","15 μL + 15μL","20 μL + 15 μL","20 μL + 20 μL"],["Total Elution Solution (μL)","20","25","30","35","40"],["Total samples","","","","",""],["","","","","",""],["Total Elution Solution for all samples (μL)","=IF(SUM(B4:F4)\u003e0,((B4*B3)+(C4*C3)+(D4*D3)+(E4*E3)+(F4*F3)+20),0)","","","","\u0000"]],"guid":"75BCC2105E1D11EC84B627AB04C95903","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":38,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"aonou","text":"Table 1: Recommended elution volumes. {"blocks":[{"key":"f19ta","text":"Remove DNase kit from -20°C to thaw at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FEE6EAF05C5311EC9ABE11CD47E5620E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"acc5m","text":"Add 100 µL 100% ETOH to each lysate and vortex to mix. If lysates were previously frozen, continue vortexing until thawed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"292in","text":"Prepare a Micro Filter Cartridge Assembly for each sample: insert a cartridge into a round-bottom microcentrifuge tube, and label both pieces.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8t51a","text":"Pipet 150 µL of lysate/ETOH mixture into the cartridge. Centrifuge for   at   to pass the lysate through the cartridge and bind the RNA to the filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":76,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"C2B3B1595E1E11EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"18400","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C2B3B2355E1E11EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3v4jg","text":"Repeat step 12 for the final 150 µL of lysate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6pre7","text":"Add 180 µL Wash Solution 1 to the cartridge. Centrifuge for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":11,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"CD4814545E1E11EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"18400","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CD48154A5E1E11EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"akie","text":"Remove cartridge from tube and discard contents. Replace cartridge back into tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5inmi","text":"Add 180 µL Wash Solution 2/3 to the cartridge. Centrifuge for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":11,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"D9D0F59D5E1E11EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"18400","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D9D0F67B5E1E11EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cmabf","text":"Repeat step 16 for a total of two washes with Wash Solution 2/3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":46,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aq3b","text":"Centrifuge for   at   to remove any residual liquid from the filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"373E84C05C3C11ECBA5B39418CC36E90","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"21300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"602C93905C3C11ECBA5B39418CC36E90","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"76fre","text":"Transfer cartridge to a new, prelabeled round-bottom microcentrifuge tube. The schematic below illustrates steps 20-22.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9peu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13hda","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"A793297062A811ECBD7FDD5F876B52AC","height":192.98181818181817,"id":198472,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":125,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"88g4a","text":"Figure 1: RNA elution is performed in two steps, then RNA is transferred to a fresh microcentrifuge tube for DNase treatment.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IPA-protocols_2-21.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4kbnyjx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4ibnyjx.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4jbnyjx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gb4hbnyjx.webp","width":580}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqqj","text":"Add the first volume of pre-heated Elution Solution to the cartridge filter. Centrifuge for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":35,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":92,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"21C1F3465E1F11EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"18400","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"21C1F41F5E1F11EC81990A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bi5kc","text":"Repeat step 20 with the second aliquot of Elution Solution. Remove and discard filter cartridge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":42,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1dutq","text":"Label an RNase-free microcentrifuge tube and transfer the Elution Solution (now containing RNA) from the round-bottom microcentrifuge tube to the RNase-free tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2c8dp","text":"Add 5 µL DNase Buffer and 1 µL DNase to each RNA sample. Vortex gently to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":12},{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e7pij","text":"Incubate samples in   water bath for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7B5F29705C3C11ECBA5B39418CC36E90","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"7E9DB2A05C3C11ECBA5B39418CC36E90","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5sqf2","text":"Add 5 µL Inactivation Reagent to each sample, and vortex gently to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dolkt","text":"Incubate samples at   for  , vortexing gently after 1 minute of incubation, and then again after the incubation is complete.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"86D8EFC05C3C11ECBA5B39418CC36E90","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"25","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"958139B05C3C11ECBA5B39418CC36E90","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75ant","text":"Centrifuge samples for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":90,"guid":"A2C55FC05C3C11ECBA5B39418CC36E90","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"21300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"AED0B7B05C3C11ECBA5B39418CC36E90","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgitc","text":"Being careful not to disturb the pellet, pipet the supernatant from each sample into a new, prelabeled RNase-free tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebp38","text":"Assess the quality and concentration of RNA using the method of your choice. The IPA Core uses the services of the Vanderbilt University Medical Center VANTAGE Core.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":152,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"D223B0E05C5611EC9ABE11CD47E5620E","url":"https://www.vumc.org/vantage/home"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"17c5h","text":" Add 10.5 mL 100% ETOH to Wash Solution 1 bottle. Mark and date the bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":9},{"style":"italic","offset":26,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6qpqe","text":"Add 22.4 mL 100% ETOH to Wash Solution 2/3 bottle. Mark and date the bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":9},{"style":"italic","offset":25,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2kcq","text":"Discard LCM Additive from DNase Kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":8,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
